function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spatial correlation of human activity and environmental factors affecting transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases similar to covid-19 starting from adjacent spaces and gradually spreading to surrounding regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to determine the distribution of infected individuals in each grid region before implementing quarantine measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial correlation of infectious disease transmission due to people’s living and work locations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection spread from adjacent space to surrounding regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission patterns leading to time series change in the number of newly infected people","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial weight concept used to calculate newly infected people in grid cells","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tobler’s first law of geography influencing covid-19 transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex mathematical equations for calculating infectious grid cell weight","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of self-protection measures such as wearing face masks, hand washing, and ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to maintaining distance from patients with a fever","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate understanding or implementation of effective self-protection measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial distribution of hospitals and number of beds impact covid-19 spread.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of intervention measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data for epidemic modeling","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable early stage estimated number of infected humans due to unknown virus characteristics and rapid interventions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in patterns of movement of crowds and levels of economic development make it difficult to clarify which country’s data are most appropriate for simulating the trend of covid-19.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of genetic algorithm to estimate parameters for dynamic model of covid-19 spread.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient sample data due to short time period and unknown infection rates","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale detection program leading to underreporting of asymptomatic cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in using early small sample data to predict the epidemic situation","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in population distribution, population flow, and medical resource detection affecting the spread of early epidemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in confirming the actual number of infected people who had already exited but had not been tested or had no symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of implementing quarantine with different intensities and intervention times to mitigate covid-19 spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on strict quarantines as the main epidemic prevention measure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate reduction in infected curves with a small number of infected humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient effectiveness of quarantine measures due to population density and distribution","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to increased peak value, extended peak arrival time, and longer epidemic duration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unnecessary use of strict quarantines in mild epidemic situations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demonstrated need for huge investment in financial, material, and human resources for strict quarantines","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate effect on reducing peak value of infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in intervention time leading to deviation from actual epidemic curve","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mild effect on reducing the peak value of covid-19 infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of self-protection measures under strict quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unimaginable amount of self-protection resources needed to achieve ideal results","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital isolation measures leading to increased spread of covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectively quarantined cases in the crowds","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in the number of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective hospital isolation measures leading to a large number of undetected or ineffectively quarantined cases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving the required number of medical beds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medical beds reaching full capacity leading to a large-scale outbreak","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemic spreading to pre-intervention levels after a short period of containment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
